segments.text: Professor Wang looks so handsome today . He is wearing a light brown suit and a pink tie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He always wears an extremely becoming suit with tie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ s quite particular about what he wears , especially about his ties . He gets different tie each day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A light brown suit and a pink tie today , and a light blue shirt and a blue tie yesterday . A perfect match !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The tie is necessary for man . It makes you look so attractive in a super tie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Match is important ; well , the way of tying is also important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My father dose not know how to tie a tie , for he often wears a cravat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My father wears a tie every day , but he can ’ t do it himself . My mother helps him with his tie every morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mother is not only a patient mother but also a gentle wife .
segments.speaker: S1
